mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT psv.specification_value_id FROM product_specification_value psv LEFT JOIN specification_value sv ON psv.specification_value_id = sv.id LEFT JOIN product_sku sku ON psv.product_sku_id = sku.id WHERE sku.spu_id = #{spuId} AND psv.is_deleted = 0 AND sv.is_deleted = 0 AND sku.is_deleted = 0
